TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ServiceRoute extends System.Web.Routing.Route

summary.span: Enables the creation of service routes over HTTP for WCF Services with support for extension-less base addresses.

span.span: Enables the creation of service routes over HTTP for WCF Services with support for extension-less base addresses.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 衍生自 。 is derived from . 當呼叫建構函式時，[!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)]將對應的路由前置字元 （url 模式） 和 （隱藏） 的路由處理常式加入 ASP.NET ，並快取的對應為路由前置字元，服務主機處理站和服務類型資訊未來的服務啟動的內部雜湊資料表。注意： 如果開發人員直接操作上的路由集合的已加入至集合，變更可能不會授與[!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)]。When the constructor is called, [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] will add the corresponding route prefix (url pattern) and a (hidden) route handler to the ASP.NET , and cache the corresponding route prefix, service host factory and service type info into an internal hash table for future service activation.Note: if developers directly manipulate the route collection on a which has been added to the collection, the change may not be granted by [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)]. [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)]如需在路由集合中變更項目的詳細資訊，請參閱 。 changing elements in a route collection, see . 建議開發人員在 global.asax 檔案中定義所有 ，而且不要以動態方式從 中移除 。It is recommended that developers define all in the global.asax file and do not remove a from the dynamically.
